fields.value: State and Local Probation and Parole Systems, 1976

authorName.value: United States Department of Justice. Office of Justice Programs. Bureau of Justice Statistics

authorAffiliation.value: United States Department of Justice. Office of Justice Programs. Bureau of Justice Statistics

dsDescriptionValue.value: This study is a census of all state and local probation and  parole systems. It was conducted in late 1976 by the United States  Census Bureau for the Bureau of Justice Statistics. The data contain  information on each agency, including jurisdiction, funding and operation, employment, and client caseload.

topicClassValue.value: ICPSR XVII.E. Social Institutions and Behavior, Crime and the Criminal Justice System
